Name: WORDLAND 3
About the game: The continuation of the successful WORDLAND . This game is a mix of puzzles and crosswords. Answer the clues, arrange the pieces and discover the words. FEATURES Designed for crosswords lovers; New piece types; Solve 100 puzzles carefully created; Enjoy 30 beautiful landscapes; Choose the level of difficulty that you want to face (Easy, Normal or Hard); Original soundtrack, specially composed to help you keep your focus and concentration; Everything in the game was made with a lot of love and craftsmanship; Can you find all words and solve each puzzle? Give it a try and show yourself you have a strong vocabulary and good spelling skills.
